title: Medicare Resources
author: R. Morgan Griffin

sections.heading: Government websites
content: State Health Insurance Assistance Programs (SHIPs). These are state-run programs that can give you free, one-on-one answers to your Medicare questions. Here's the contact information for all SHIP programs.
Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services
Medicare.gov. The official U.S. government website for people with Medicare Phone: 800-MEDICARE (800-633-4227)
Social Security Administration Phone: 800-772-1213

meta_description: WebMD provides a list of resources, including government and private agencies, that can help you understand your Medicare coverage.
